BBK01.SUD027: Outstanding amounts (volumes) of German banks / Housing loans to households with maturity of over 1 year and up to 5 years

General: Data based on mothly balance sheet statistics. Secured and unsecured loans for home purchase, including building and home improvements; including loans granted by building and loan associations and interim credits as well as transmitted loans granted by the reporting agents in their own name and for their own account. p = Provisional
